text: The Verify feedback list should not show "Mapped" or "Pending" - IF the feedback has already been categorized, just show the category (UX, Feature, etc). If it's pending, show a loading spinner icon. If there's been an error, show an error icon, with the error shown as a hover tooltip.
taskTitles: Replace Mapped/Pending labels with category badges in Verify feedback feed
Add loading spinner for pending feedback categorization
Add error icon with hover tooltip for failed feedback categorization
